creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk
text: A mirage of fish painted to extent of horror i vacuii. All are created meticulously with an almost scientific accuracy. Towards the bottom are crabs, a lobster, prawns, a stingray, flounder.
title: Eighty-eight Fish
